scripts.setup: bun install && bun install --cwd packages/www && bun install --cwd packages/portal && bun install --cwd packages/schema && bun install --cwd docs
scripts.build: bun run build:www && bun run build:portal && bun run build:schema && bun run build:docs
scripts.build:all: bun run build:www && bun run build:portal && bun run build:schema && bun run build:api && bun run build:docs
scripts.build:api: cd packages/api; cargo install -q worker-build; worker-build --release
scripts.dev: echo 'Run dev servers individually: bun run dev:www, dev:portal, dev:schema, dev:api, or dev:docs'
scripts.db:migrate:local: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --local --config packages/schema/wrangler.jsonc
scripts.db:migrate:remote: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --remote --config packages/schema/wrangler.jsonc
scripts.deploy: bun run deploy:www && bun run deploy:portal && bun run deploy:schema && bun run deploy:docs
scripts.deploy:all: bun run deploy:www && bun run deploy:portal && bun run deploy:schema && bun run deploy:api && bun run deploy:docs
